radiographic_examinations.findings: Baseline predexamethasone cortisol values were abnormally high, and the patient showed a lack of diurnal variation. Postdexamethasone cortisol levels showed some suppression.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: After 9 ECTs, all postdexamethasone cortisol levels were normally suppressed, indicating normalization of the HPA dysfunction.
